alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 10:26PM EDT until July 12 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.8 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.3 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Tue 10 pm: 8.4 Forecast: Tue 10 pm 8.4 Wed 2 am 8.3 Wed 8 am 8.0 Wed 2 pm 7.8 Wed 8 pm 7.6 Thu 2 am 7.4 Thu 8 am 7.2 Thu 2 pm 7.0 Thu 8 pm 6.8 Fri 2 am 6.7 Fri 8 am 6.6 Fri 2 pm 6.6 &&
